Replace.Text: Three tile impassable natural wonder. Provides +5 [ICON_Gold] Gold to adjacent tiles. Major adjacency bonus to Theater Square and Commercial Hub districts. The city that owns the tile receives +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold on its outgoing international [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes.
占3个单元格且无法通行的自然奇观。为相邻单元格提供+5 [ICON_Gold] 金币。为“剧院广场”和“商业中心”区域提供大量相邻加成。如领土中包含此单元格，城市的对外国际 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线提供+4 [ICON_Gold] 金币。

One tile natural wonder. Provides +6 [ICON_Science] Science, +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith, and Fresh Water. Land combat units that enter it receive the ability 'Water of Life' (+10 HP healing in any territory).
占1个单元格的自然奇观。提供+6 [ICON_Science] 科技值、+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值，以及淡水。进入此奇观的陆地战斗单位将获得能力“生命之水”（在任意领土中+10生命值恢复）。
Three tile impassable natural wonder. Provides +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold to adjacent tiles.
不可逾越的3个单元格的自然奇观。为邻近单元格+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值和+2 [ICON_Gold] 金币。

Three tile impassable natural wonder. It appears as a Mountain and provides +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith to adjacent tiles. Religious units who move next to Mount Everest ignore Hills for the rest of the game.
占3个单元格的自然奇观，山脉，无法通行。相邻的单元格 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值+2。移动到珠穆朗玛峰附近的宗教单位可在之后的游戏中无视丘陵的影响。
Naval combat units that enter adjacent plots are granted their next promotion. Provides +1 [ICON_Production] Production to adjacent tiles.
海军战斗单位进入相邻格位后将获得升级。为邻近单元格+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。
One tile natural wonder. It appears as a Lake and provides +6 [ICON_Faith] Faith, +2 [ICON_Science] Science, and Fresh Water.
1个单元格的自然奇观。它的表现形式为湖泊，+6 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值和+2 [ICON_Science] 科技值，并提供淡水。

Two tile natural wonder. It appears with Cliffs adjacent to water and provides +3 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold. Provides +4 appeal, instead of the standard +2 appeal of Natural Wonders, to adjacent tiles.
占2个单元格的自然奇观。随水域旁的悬崖出现，提供+3 [ICON_Culture] 文化值和 +4 [ICON_Gold] 金币。为相邻单元格提供+4魅力，而非自然奇观通常的+2魅力。
Two tile natural wonder that can be found on coastal terrain and provides +2 [ICON_Food] Food, +1 [ICON_Production] Production, +2 [ICON_Science] Science and +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
在海岸地形上的2个单元格的自然奇观，+2 [ICON_Food] 食物，+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力，+2 [ICON_Science] 科技值和+2 [ICON_Gold] 金币。

Two tile natural wonder that can be found on coastal terrain and provides +4 [ICON_FOOD] Food, +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. +15 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending in this tile.
占两个单元格的自然奇观，位于海岸地貌上。+4 [ICON_FOOD] 食物、+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力、+1 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化。在此单元格中进行防御时+15 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力。

Two tile natural wonder. It appears as a Lake and provides +3 [ICON_Faith] Faith and +3 [ICON_Culture] Culture. Units heal completely if they heal for one turn adjacent to the Dead Sea. Does not provide Fresh Water.
占2个单元格的湖泊自然奇观，提供+3 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值及+3 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。单位相邻死海时选择恢复一回合，可在此期间完全恢复。不提供淡水。
Two tile natural wonder. It appears as a Lake and provides +3 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production. Does not provide Fresh Water.
占2个单元格的湖泊自然奇观。提供+3 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值、+2 [ICON_GOLD] 金币、+1 [ICON_FOOD] 食物、+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力。不提供淡水。
Three tile natural wonder. It provides +3 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +2 [ICON_Production] Production.
占3个单元格的自然奇观，提供+3 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值与+2 [ICON_Production] 生产力。

Three tile natural wonder. Provides +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, +3 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith. After the game reaches the Atomic Era it provides an additional +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science.
占3个单元格的自然奇观。+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力，+3 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值，+1 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值。游戏进入原子能时代后额外+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力、+1 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值。
Four tile natural wonder. It appears as Marsh and provides +3 [ICON_Food] Food and +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture.
4个单元格的自然奇观。它的表现形式为沼泽，+3 [ICON_Food] 食物和+2 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。
Four tile natural wonder. It provides +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith, +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science, +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture, and +4 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
占4个单元格的自然奇观，提供+1 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值，+1 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值、+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值、+4 [ICON_GOLD] 金币。
Four tile natural wonder. It appears as Marsh and provides +3 [ICON_FAITH] Faith, +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food, and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.
占4个单元格的沼泽自然奇观。+3 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值、+1 [ICON_FOOD] 食物、+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力。
Four tile natural wonder. It provides +2 [ICON_Food] Food, +2 [ICON_Production] Production, and +1 [ICON_Science] Science.
占4个单元格的自然奇观，提供+2 [ICON_Food] 食物、+2 [ICON_Production] 生产力、+1 [ICON_Science] 科技值。
